summary: Page 84 (book page 104) covers sections פה through פז. This is a shorter page with content only on the upper portion. The page_number 'קד' in meta is correct. All three sections are captured with correct numbering and proper structure. One major text accuracy issue in section פז with garbled Aramaic.

issues.description: OCR has 'כי מאן דכרן שׁל לקיס [?] לעתיד' which contains garbled text. 'מאן דכרן של לקיס' is not recognizable Hebrew/Aramaic. This passage needs re-reading from the original image. It may be something like 'כי מאן דבעי למשקל שכרו לעתיד' or another Aramaic phrase.
issues.original_text: כי מאן דכרן שׁל לקיס [?] לעתיד

issues.description: OCR has 'דבש לפי מ'' - the character after מ is unclear. In the image left column, the source appears to show 'דבש לפי מ'' but there may also be additional source text 'ורבש לפי מ"ז' visible below.
OCR has 'כ"כ הרב הנזכר שם, משם הרב מהרש"א' - the final letter may be ל (maharshal) rather than א (maharsha). Looking at the image the exact reading is ambiguous.

issues.location: section פו, left column additional text
issues.description: In the left column under כשרבים עושים מצוה, there appears to be additional source text 'ורבש לפי מ"ז' which may be a second source reference or part of the body text. This was not captured in the OCR.
